verbose_text: Pozzi et al. [XREF_BIBR] conducted a multicenter study in subjects with IgA nephropathy having proteinuria of 1.0-3.5 g/day and serum creatinine levels of 1.5 mg/dL or less and reported that steroid therapy, including three-course pulse therapy, significantly inhibited the progress of renal dysfunction up to 10 years after treatment.
